narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Mosaic Senior Services INC is a In Home Supportive Care provider based in Tucson, AZ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $74.4M in Medicaid payments across 197K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $74.4M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
